mapper.insert: insert into Video(youtubeID, title, start_s, end_s, playlistID) values (#{youtubeID}, #{title}, #{start_s}, #{end_s}, #{playlistID})
mapper.select: select * from Video, videocheck where Video.playlistID=#{playlistID} AND Video.playlistID = videocheck.playlistID AND Video.id = videocheck.videoID order by Video.seq
